title: China Telecom Logo
content:
Which face are they using for the china telecom logo and do you know of any similar?

[http://en.chinatelecom.com.cn/images/en\_logo\_en.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019195002/http:/en.chinatelecom.com.cn/images/en_logo_en.gif "http://en.chinatelecom.com.cn/images/en\_logo\_en.gif")

Thanks in advance
author: voiceof

comments.content:
It does look similar, The C's and the M seem different though. Maybe it's just the quality making it look that way.

Any other suggestions?
Looks custom (because it’s so ugly - don’t mean to offend anyone). The right stem of the M is just wrong. It should be heavier. Shapes are all very simple.
I think it's [Charcoal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019195002/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/apple/charcoal/), the system font from Mac OS 9.
Yeah. Could be. squooshed and with the M countered.
